charinfo.name: Maito Gai
charinfo.description: The squad leader of Team Gai, and father-like figure to Lee, Gai is a passionate man that's always there for those who need him. In combat, Gai's taijutsu has no equal, being able to open the Eight Gates and pound away at all threats.

abilities.name: Leaf Whirlwind
abilities.description: Gai kicks with a strong whirlwind hitting one enemy for 30 damage. During 'Sixth Gate Opening' this skill is improved and deals 60 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability.

abilities.name: Sixth Gate Opening
abilities.description: Gai receives 40 affliction damage.* This effect can't kill Gai. The following 2 turns, 'Leaf Whirlwind' will deal 60 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability. During this time Gai is invulnerable.

abilities.name: Counter Punch
abilities.description: Gai singles out one enemy to counter attack. If that enemy uses a harmful skill they will be countered and receive 30 damage. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Gai Dodge
abilities.description: This skill makes Maito Gai invulnerable for 1 turn.
